thoughts.text: I think I can use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve a list of all the hyperlinks on a webpage.
thoughts.reasoning: I want to retrieve a list of all the hyperlinks on a webpage, and using the 'get_hyperlinks' command will allow me to do that easily.
thoughts.plan:
- Decide on the URL of the webpage to retrieve the hyperlinks from.
- Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve a list of all the hyperlinks on the webpage.
- Check that the list of hyperlinks is displayed correctly.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful to make sure the URL is correct and that the hyperlinks are relevant and useful.
thoughts.speak: I think I can use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve a list of all the hyperlinks on a webpage. I will need to be careful to make sure the URL is correct and that the hyperlinks are relevant and useful.
